00034 // DLLs in Windows should use the standard calling convention
00035 #ifndef ADR_CALL
00036   #if defined(WIN32) || defined(_WIN32)
00037     #define ADR_CALL __stdcall
00038   #else
00039     #define ADR_CALL
00040   #endif
00041 #endif
00042 
00043 // Export functions from the DLL
00044 #ifndef ADR_DECL
00045 #  if defined(WIN32) || defined(_WIN32)
00046 #    ifdef AUDIERE_EXPORTS
00047 #      define ADR_DECL __declspec(dllexport)
00048 #    else
00049 #      define ADR_DECL __declspec(dllimport)
00050 #    endif
00051 #  else
00052 #    define ADR_DECL
00053 #  endif
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 
00057 
00058 #define ADR_FUNCTION(ret) extern "C" ADR_DECL ret ADR_CALL

00063   class RefCounted {
00064   protected:
00072     ~RefCounted() { }
00073 
00074   public:
00078     virtual void ADR_CALL ref() = 0;
00079 
00084     virtual void ADR_CALL unref() = 0;
00085   };
00086 
00087 
00088   template<typename T>
00089   class RefPtr {
00090   public:
00091     RefPtr(T* ptr = 0) {
00092       m_ptr = 0;
00093       *this = ptr;
00094     }
00095 
00096     RefPtr(const RefPtr<T>& ptr) {
00097       m_ptr = 0;
00098       *this = ptr;
00099     }
00100 
00101     ~RefPtr() {
00102       if (m_ptr) {
00103         m_ptr->unref();
00104         m_ptr = 0;
00105       }
00106     }
00107  
00108     RefPtr<T>& operator=(T* ptr) {
00109       if (ptr != m_ptr) {
00110         if (m_ptr) {
00111           m_ptr->unref();
00112         }
00113         m_ptr = ptr;
00114         if (m_ptr) {
00115           m_ptr->ref();
00116         }
00117       }
00118       return *this;
00119     }
00120 
00121     RefPtr<T>& operator=(const RefPtr<T>& ptr) {
00122       *this = ptr.m_ptr;
00123       return *this;
00124     }
00125 
00126     T* operator->() const {
00127       return m_ptr;
00128     }
00129 
00130     T& operator*() const {
00131       return *m_ptr;
00132     }
00133 
00134     operator bool() const {
00135       return (m_ptr != 0);
00136     }
00137 
00138     T* get() const {
00139       return m_ptr;
00140     }
00141 
00142   private:
00143     T* m_ptr;
00144   };

00151   template<class Interface>
00152   class RefImplementation : public Interface {
00153   protected:
00154     RefImplementation() {
00155       m_ref_count = 0;
00156     }
00157 
00162     virtual ~RefImplementation() { }
00163 
00164   public:
00165     void ADR_CALL ref() {
00166       ++m_ref_count;
00167     }
00168 
00169     void ADR_CALL unref() {
00170       if (--m_ref_count == 0) {
00171         delete this;
00172       }
00173     }
00174 
00175   private:
00176     int m_ref_count;
00177   };

00805   inline const char* GetVersion() {

00810   inline void SplitString(
00811     std::vector<std::string>& out,
00812     const char* in,
00813     char delim)
00814   {
00815     out.clear();
00816     while (*in) {
00817       const char* next = strchr(in, delim);
00818       if (next) {
00819         out.push_back(std::string(in, next));
00820       } else {
00821         out.push_back(in);
00822       }
00823 
00824       in = (next ? next + 1 : "");
00825     }
00826   }

00828 
00830   struct FileFormatDesc {
00832     std::string description;
00833 
00835     std::vector<std::string> extensions;
00836   };
00837 
00839   inline void GetSupportedFileFormats(std::vector<FileFormatDesc>& formats) {
00840     std::vector<std::string> descriptions;
00841     SplitString(descriptions, hidden::AdrGetSupportedFileFormats(), ';');
00842 
00843     formats.resize(descriptions.size());
00844     for (unsigned i = 0; i < descriptions.size(); ++i) {
00845       const char* d = descriptions[i].c_str();
00846       const char* colon = strchr(d, ':');
00847       formats[i].description.assign(d, colon);
00848 
00849       SplitString(formats[i].extensions, colon + 1, ',');
00850     }
00851   }
00852 
00853 
00855   struct AudioDeviceDesc {
00857     std::string name;
00858 
00859     // Textual description of device.
00860     std::string description;
00861   };
00862 
00864   inline void GetSupportedAudioDevices(std::vector<AudioDeviceDesc>& devices) {
00865     std::vector<std::string> descriptions;
00866     SplitString(descriptions, hidden::AdrGetSupportedAudioDevices(), ';');
00867 
00868     devices.resize(descriptions.size());
00869     for (unsigned i = 0; i < descriptions.size(); ++i) {
00870       std::vector<std::string> d;
00871       SplitString(d, descriptions[i].c_str(), ':');
00872       devices[i].name        = d[0];
00873       devices[i].description = d[1];
00874     }
00875   }
